Été Meurtrier

Video collective based in Paris

About




Eté Meurtrier is launched in 2014
by Antonin Mesnil & Lilian Hardouineau.

We work for art, music
and immersive projects.

hello@etemeurtrier.fr

Development: Rémy Maucourt
